meanings.definition: A pair of straps that pass over the shoulders and fasten to the waistband of trousers or a skirt.
meanings.sent1: She adjusted her braces to keep her pants up.
meanings.sent2: The braces on his overalls were red and sturdy.
meanings.sent3: The clown's colorful braces matched his oversized shoes.
meanings.sent4: Her braces of friendship held her close-knit group together.
meanings.sent5: The braces on the bridge supported the weight of the cars.

meanings.definition: A device fitted to something, in particular a weak or injured part of the body, to give support.
meanings.sent1: The knee braces helped him walk without pain.
meanings.sent2: The back brace provided support after the injury.
meanings.sent3: The robot wore braces to keep its circuits in place.
meanings.sent4: Her emotional braces helped her through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The braces on the shelf prevented it from collapsing.

meanings.definition: A system of wires or bands used to straighten teeth.
meanings.sent1: She got her braces tightened at the orthodontist.
meanings.sent2: The braces on his teeth made him self-conscious.
meanings.sent3: The braces on the fence kept the mischievous dog out.
meanings.sent4: His braces of determination helped him achieve a perfect smile.
meanings.sent5: The braces on the train tracks ensured a smooth ride for passengers.
